name: IKImageBrowserCell
desc: A class that is used to display a cell conforming to the IKImageBrowserItem Protocol in an IKImageBrowserView.

items.name: func frame() -> NSRect
items.desc: Returns the receiver’s frame rectangle, which defines its position in its IKImageBrowserView.

items.name: func imageFrame() -> NSRect
items.desc: Returns the receiver’s image frame rectangle, which defines the position of the thumbnail in its IKImageBrowserView.

items.name: func subtitleFrame() -> NSRect
items.desc: Returns the receiver’s subtitle frame rectangle.

items.name: func titleFrame() -> NSRect
items.desc: Returns the receiver’s title frame rectangle.

items.name: func imageContainerFrame() -> NSRect
items.desc: Returns the receiver’s image container frame rectangle, which defines the position of the container of the thumbnail.

items.name: func indexOfRepresentedItem() -> Int
items.desc: Returns the index of the receiver’s represented object in the datasource.

items.name: func isSelected() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns whether the cell is selected.

items.name: func selectionFrame() -> NSRect
items.desc: Returns the receiver’s selection frame rectangle, which defines the position of the selection rectangle in its IKImageBrowserView.

items.name: func imageAlignment() -> NSImageAlignment
items.desc: Returns the position of the cell’s image in the frame.

items.name: func opacity() -> CGFloat
items.desc: Returns the opacity of the receiver.

items.name: func cellState() -> IKImageBrowserCellState
items.desc: Returns the current cell state of the receiver.

items.name: func layer(forType: String!) -> CALayer!
items.desc: Returns a layer for the specified position.

items.name: func imageBrowserView() -> IKImageBrowserView!
items.desc: Returns the view the receiver uses to display the cell.

items.name: struct IKImageBrowserCellState
items.desc: The possible states for the browser cell. These values are used by the cellState() method.
